Ingredients
1 1/4
ounce
Averna
1 1/4
ounces
reposado tequila
, such as Don Julio
1/2
ounce
Godiva
chocolate liqueur
2
drops
orange bitters
Ice
small
dark chocolate bar
Directions
Measure Averna, tequila, and chocolate liqueur into a mixing glass. Add bitters. Fill glass with ice and shake well for ten seconds. Strain into a cocktail glass. Grate chocolate over drink and serve.
Special equipment
cocktail shaker, cocktail strainer, grater
